channel.title: csharp on Timur Bahadir
channel.description: Recent content in csharp on Timur Bahadir

item.title: Tiler
item.description: A casual clicker game made with Godot 3.1 using C#. Intended for mobile devices but delayed since mobile export with C# doesn’t work yet. A demo can be downloaded, currently only for Windows.

item.title: UniVRsity Nightmare - A VR-Shooter
item.description: For a game development class in university we had to create a game. In a team of three we decided to make use of the, at the time, new VR technology. In the game, the player is a student stuck inside a nightmare. He needs to defend himself from waves of university related utensils like books, paper airplanes and erasers. For each utensil that reaches the player he looses one life.
